titleStmt.title: The present state of London: or, Memorials comprehending a full and succinct account of the ancient and modern state thereof. By Tho. De-Laune, Gent
titleStmt.author: De Laune, Thomas, d. 1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by George Larkin, for Enoch Prosser and John How, at the Rose and Crown, and Seven Stars, in Sweetings-Alley, near the Royal Exchange in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: Sweetings-Alley, near the Royal Exchange in Cornhil
